about_the_game:
*Trailer and screenshots are from an early demo version of the game. New and updated content coming soon!*

Six years after leaving her family to join the Sisters of the Whiterock Coven, young Edith is anxious to finally return home. But first, she has to pass her Trial of Ascension—a harrowing task bestowed by her patron deity, made all the more insufferable by an unexpected companion: Colette, a fellow acolyte and Edith’s long-time bully. Together, the two must complete the Trial, no matter the consequences.

Then, when it’s all over, Edith can hopefully reunite with her family… *if* she survives.

Features

Silverblood is a fantasy visual novel set in the colorful nation of Alderell, where the choices you make change the outcome of the story—and magic is always a solution to your problems. Silverblood boasts the following features:

  • Meaningful choices that impact the narrative and 4 unique endings
  • Charmingly gloomy storybook aesthetics featuring original hand-drawn art
  • Dramatic timed encounters that test your skills in battle, stealth, and more
  • Draw magic runes to cast spells—every choice has a magical solution
  • Take a breather with Edith to enjoy the scenery and smell the flowers
  • Fully-voiced cinematics and partially-voiced gameplay
  • A beautiful original score by Orpheo Fenn of Faefield Productions

Release Schedule

Silverblood is a fantasy-drama visual novel set to release episodically on a monthly basis. It contains 7 chapters.
  • Chapter one will be available for free as a standalone demo! Sample Edith's story before you purchase Silverblood.
  • Chapter two will be available for purchase on initial release. With your one-time purchase, you will receive all future content updates at no additional cost, including all 7 chapters of Silverblood.
